title: Well-Traveled N300 Mayo Kid Nichols for Sale  ***SOLD***
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: Well-Traveled N300 Mayo Kid Nichols for Sale  ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
Ungraded card of the HOFer that would be a good place-holder until you are ready to upgrade. Well-worn corners and abraded edges and back that have removed the black finish in some places. No Magic Marker cover-ups here. 

Nice price for a tough-to-find Hall of Famer.

$700 net to me for insured delivery to you.***SOLD***
[url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url]
I’ll take it if that doesn’t work out

Damn!  How can I be so late to the party when you just posted this last night?!!

(And I’m not even on time enough to be the first alternate!). Feels like when I put my fantasy baseball claim in behind the early/fast-movers!

Oh well - thx anyway!

Jeff
I check this page like 3 times every day. Except yesterday. Ugh!

Wow, sold in 18 minutes! 

Anyone know if that is a record time?
